org.spongepowered.api.text.transform

Class DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.transform.DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SimpleTextFormatter>, TextElement, TextRepresentable, PartitionedTextFormatter<SimpleTextFormatter>, TextFormatter<SimpleTextFormatter>

    public class DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter
extends Object
implements PartitionedTextFormatter<SimpleTextFormatter>
    Implementation of PartitionedTextFormatter that allows for modifications on the partitions.
